titles.title: Let Me See Thy Face and Die

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Surrounded by the saints of old, We now by faith approach to Thee Shall all with unveiled face behold In Christ the glorious Deity; Shall see, and put the Godhead on, The nature of Thy sinless Son. I cannot see Thy face and live, Then let me see Thy face and die!{/lang-eng}
